title: Year 1: Mail Room
description: Type commands into the Program area.
Your program should tell your worker to grab each thing from the INBOX, and drop it into the OUTBOX.
datasets: new Function('let dataset = []; for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) dataset.push(Math.trunc(Math.random() * 41) - 20); return {input: dataset, output: dataset};')
